init

  • init(params?: Partial<BMP280ControlMeasurement & BMP280Config>): Promise<BMP280Interface>
    • Defined in BMP280Interface.ts:29

    Resets, reads temp/press correction and initializes the device with the params or default.

    throws

    DeviceError if device ID doesn't correspond with BMP280 id

    Parameters

    • Optional params: Partial<BMP280ControlMeasurement & BMP280Config>

    Returns Promise<BMP280Interface>

  • readPressureCorrection(): Promise<BMP280Interface>
    • Defined in BMP280Interface.ts:73
